description: This file defines a Controller class for a TodoMVC application, managing interactions between the model and view components, handling user actions, and updating the UI accordingly.

classes.name: Controller
classes.description: A controller class that mediates between the model and view in a TodoMVC app, handling user interactions and updating the UI.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the Controller with model and view, binding callbacks for user actions.

methods.name: setView
methods.description: Sets the current view based on URL hash and updates the filter.

methods.name: showActive
methods.description: Displays only active (not completed) todo items.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the given title.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enters editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: editItemSave
methods.description: Saves changes to an item or removes it if title is empty.

methods.name: editItemCancel
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and restores original title.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles completion status of an item.

methods.name: _updateCount
methods.description: Updates UI elements showing counts of active/completed todos.

methods.name: _filter
methods.description: Filters todo items based on current route and re-renders.

methods.name: _updateFilter
methods.description: Updates the active filter based on current page.
